name: CONTACT_INFO_LIST_STRUCTURE
description: Defines the structure of a list of contact information, where each <ContactInfo> node contains a unique identifier, a reference to an individual, a contact type, and associated communication details (phone and email).
prompt: Validate that each <ContactInfo> in <ContactInfoList> contains a unique <ContactInfoID>, an <IndividualRef>, a <ContactTypeText>, and valid <Phone> and <EmailAddress> nodes.
